GSD.product_version: versions from v3.2 to before v4.14.257
GSD.description:
staging: rtl8192e: Fix use after free in _rtl92e_pci_disconnect()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.257 by commit c0ef0e75a858cbd8618b473f22fbca36106dcf82, it was introduced in version v3.2 by commit 66898177e7e5486dc77a4ba742efa4e2e9e900a4. For more details please see the references link.
